personal_statement_what_to_improve: The candidate's personal statement contained a comprehensive list of past work experience. However, it did not convey why they have decided to pursue secondary teaching at this time, nor did it convey a passion in particular for Media Studies.
subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: The ITT course in Media Studies requires the trainee to teach classes at Key Stage 4 (GCSE) and Key Stage 5 (A Level), and sometimes on alternative courses such as BTECs.  We would ideally like the candidate to show that they have secure knowledge to teach Media across these key stages, for at least one exam board.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: We would ideally like to see at least one reference from a recent employee who knows the candidate in a professional context (rather than as a friend).
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: Our Media course is incredibly competitive, with just two places on offer each year, and this was not the strongest application we have received.
